brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to investigate the treatment and natural history of acromegaly.
       We have a longstanding interest in acromegaly treatment, and a cohort that has been
      followed for 30 years, or more in some cases.  We will continue to follow patients and
      recruit new patients for treatment and follow-up.  Blood and pituitary tumor tissue (when
      available through clinical care) will be saved for future analyses related to acromegaly.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Treatment and Natural History of Acromegaly

detailed_description.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to investigate the treatment and natural history of acromegaly.
       We have a longstanding interest in acromegaly treatment, and a cohort that has been
      followed for 30 years, or more in some cases.  We will continue to follow patients and
      recruit new patients for treatment and follow-up.

criteria.textblock:
-  INCLUSION CRITERIA:

        Patients will be enrolled who are 18 years of age or over who are referred for care.
